Name: Dark Dealings
About the game: Dark Dealings is a unique 3D open-world experience and a re-imagining of the classic 'Dope Wars' trading game set in a quirky world your goal is to become the best in the business and rise to the top the hard way, on the streets! Its time to get on your bike and meet your customer's demands! The clock is ticking. Explore a vast open 3D world populated with unique characters and items! Learn the markets and make a killing trading in illicit substances. Warning, your perceptions may be altered! Hack into motor vehicles and go for a joy ride! Craft new substances and improve your profits! Enjoy the views on the open ocean or a bike ride through the park! Purchase properties and businesses to expand your empire! Trade in stocks and shares on the open market! Watch as the world develops through your actions! Over 100 songs to enjoy on the in game radios! Dark Dealings is an ever expanding world and you can expect many new features being added in the future including a full quest line and the possibility of online play. Every game developed at Tegridy Ltd also comes complete with the Tegridy Promise No Micro-transactions , No Subscriptions and No Dlc's. No DRM No Exclusives One Game, One Price!
